about_the_game:
Fellow adventurer,

This Official Walkthrough Chart guides you through all the puzzles in all three acts of the game. It's also the actual chart that I have been using to keep track of puzzles, the triggering of cutscenes and whatnot during the actual development of the game. I think of it as a mixture of a puzzle dependency graph and a walkthrough.

To keep the chart reasonably short, it assumes you explore every scene and pick up everything that isn't nailed to the wall (but we all do that anyway, right) 🙂
Should you find a bug in the chart, ping me over at www.warmkitten.com/discord 👊

Bonus: This chart also contains the secret code to enable Box Mode.

The chart comes in the form of a PDF file allowing infinite zooming and text searching.

➡️Note: The file "JustinChart.pdf" will be placed in the game's install directory. To locate your install directory - right click the game in your Library->Properties->Local Files->Browse 👍

Enjoy!
/Pontus
